I’m Brian Cervantes Alvarez—a Data Science Educator, Statistician, and Data Scientist passionate about transforming data into meaningful insights. This portfolio showcases my journey through the world of data, combining analytical rigor, interactive teaching, and innovative problem-solving.  

From developing interactive educational tools to tackling real-world challenges with cutting-edge statistical techniques, my work reflects a deep commitment to data-driven solutions. Whether you’re here to explore my projects, learn more about my expertise, or collaborate on new ideas, you’ll find a wealth of resources highlighting my skills and experiences.
